title: Lot of 12 raw low and ungraded T206 cards - includes HOF & SL
author: cguidi

posts.post_title: Lot of 12 raw low and ungraded T206 cards - includes HOF & SL
posts.post_content:
Looking to deal this as a lot before listing on eBay so please no single card offers.  See scans for detail but this lot is in mostly Poor/Fair condition with maybe a good or two snuck in. Not totally beaters though.  Includes Chance, Duffy and Smith (SL).  Backs are Piedmont, Sweet Cap, and Polar Bear.

Asking $275 shipped.

I will be out running errands during the day so I may not be able to reply promptly to requests for addition information but will try to get to them tonight.  Please note that a firm commitment to buy will supersede interest and inquiries in priority.  Thanks for looking!
